Add Food Remove Food Modify Food Rewards Add Food Here Enter Food Name Enter Food Quantity Select image Short Description Receiver Be a Recipient Be a Donor Enter Description Enter Food Expiry Time 0.0 m No Food Donate Date Recent Order Expiry Time : No Chats Found Time No Food Found Sender Name No Cart Item Found Order Now Home Delivery Pick Up Thank you for placing your order Your order is Waiting for you Your order is On the way Go back Order Summary Deliver to : charge Enter Phone Number Enter your address Order Again Status General Help Track Order About About app (Introduction):> Welcome to eco food tracker, where we believe in the power of food to bring people together and make a positive impact in our communities. Our mission is simple yet profound: to reduce food waste by connecting those with excess food to those in need. Our Vision : At our core, we envision a world where no one goes hungry, and where surplus food is shared rather than wasted. We are passionate about leveraging technology to facilitate the redistribution of excess food and to address the pressing issue of food insecurity. Purpose : Our food application serves as a platform for individuals, businesses, and organizations to easily donate surplus food to those who need it most. Whether you're a restaurant with leftover meals at the end of the day, a grocery store with excess produce, or a homeowner with extra groceries, our app provides a convenient way to connect with people to ensure that no food goes to waste. Features : Seamless Donation Process: Our user-friendly interface makes it easy to list surplus food items and connect with nearby organizations in need. - Real-Time Updates: Receive notifications when a nearby charity is in need of specific food items, allowing for quick and efficient donations. - Impact Tracking: Track the impact of your donations, including the amount of food saved from being wasted and the number of individuals served. - Community Engagement: Join a community of like-minded individuals and businesses who are committed to reducing food waste and fighting hunger. Our team : Behind our food application is a dedicated team of developers, food enthusiasts, and social activists who are passionate about making a difference. With a shared commitment to sustainability and social responsibility, we work tirelessly to improve our platform and expand our reach to help more people in need. Values : Sustainability: We believe in sustainable practices and are committed to reducing food waste and environmental impact. - Compassion: We approach our work with empathy and compassion, understanding the importance of supporting those facing food insecurity. - Collaboration: We recognize that solving complex issues like hunger requires collaboration and partnerships across sectors, and we actively seek opportunities to work together towards our common goals. Contact information : We'd love to hear from you! If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions for how we can improve our app, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at [Insert Contact Information]. Together, we can make a difference in the fight against food waste and hunger. Thank you for joining us on this journey to create a more sustainable and equitable food system. Together, we can ensure that everyone has access to nutritious food and no one goes hungry. Terms and Conditions Introduction Welcome to eco food tracker. These Terms and Conditions govern your access to and use of the App's services. By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any aspect of these terms, please do not use the App. 1.Use of the App : You must be at least 13 years old to use the App. By using the App, you represent and warrant that you are at least 13 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms and Conditions. 2.Account Registration : Some features of the App may require you to register an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process and to keep your account credentials secure. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. 3.User Conduct : You agree to use the App in compliance with applicable laws and regulations and in a manner that does not infringe upon the rights of others or interfere with the operation of the App. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to: 
 
Violating any laws or regulations. Uploading or sharing content that is unlawful, harmful, or offensive. Attempting to gain unauthorized access to the App's systems or networks. Intellectual Property: The App and its content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are protected by intellectual property laws and are the property of the App or its licensors. You may not reproduce, modify, distribute, or create derivative works based on the App's content without prior written consent. 4.Disclaimer of Warranties : The App is provided on an 'as-is' and 'as-available' basis without any warranties of any kind, whether express or implied. We do not warrant that the App will be error-free or uninterrupted, or that any defects will be corrected. 5.Limitation of Liability : To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the App, including but not limited to lost profits, loss of data, or loss of goodwill. 6.Indemnification : You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the App, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, or losses arising out of your use of the App or violation of these Terms and Conditions. 7.Changes to Terms : We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised terms on the App. Your continued use of the App after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes. 7.Contact Information : If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at Thank you for using our App. We hope you enjoy your experience! Here Help and support Feedback What is Eco Food Tracker and how does it work? Answer: Eco Food Tracker App is a platform that connects people who have leftover food with those who would like it. Users can list their excess food, and others can search and pick up the food for free or a donation. Is the food on Eco Food Tracker App safe to eat? Answer: While we encourage responsible food sharing practices, we cannot guarantee the safety of the food. Users are responsible for following safe food handling guidelines and checking the condition of the food before consuming it What types of food can be shared on Eco Food Tracker App? Answer: You can share a variety of homemade or commercially prepared food items that are safe for consumption. However, we do not allow raw meat, seafood, or anything that requires specific temperature control. How do I list food I want to share? Answer: The listing process is usually straightforward. You'll provide details like the type of food, quantity, dietary restrictions (if any), pickup location and time, and any photos. How do I search for food on Eco Food Tracker App? Answer: You can search for food by location, dietary restrictions, or keywords. You can also filter results by pickup time or distance. Can I reserve food listed on the app? Answer: Depending on the app's functionality, reservation options might vary. Some apps allow users to directly message the donor to arrange pickup, while others might have a reservation system. How do I create an account? Answer: Account creation usually involves signing up with your email address or social media account.
